means: 不倦的，持续的，不松懈的

sentence.Network_en: He was sustained by the unflagging support of his family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他得到了家人不断的支持。

sentence.Network_en: The book is not one word too long and its narrative pace is unflagging.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书文字简洁，叙事流畅。

sentence.Network_en: We owed the Shah a great deal for his unflagging loyalty during the October War.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应当大大感谢伊朗国王在十月战争期间表现的始终不渝的忠诚.

PerfectNetExp.abs: unfixed 解脱的unflagging 不屈不挠的unflaggingly 不衰地
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... agonizing 烦恼,苦闷的 unflagging 不衰的 superior 上好的.
不懈 indefatigable不懈 unflagging不懈 unremitting
pretence 借口，假装，自吹unflagging 不减弱的，不垂头丧气的delegate 委员，代表

list.abs: "unflagging"怎么说合适-翻译"unflagging"... ...  unflagging effort 不懈努力; unfading unflagging 不衰的.
a person of unflagging conscience ., 正义感坚定的人.
this may be what The Times meant by " boundless energy and unflagging optimism " .这可能是《泰晤士报》称他“拥有无限精力和乐观精神”的意思。
The co - operation of these governments requires unflagging effort ., 政府间的这些合作需要坚持不懈的努力.

entry.tran: （支持、努力、热情等）不懈的，持续的
entry.def: If you describe something such as support, effort, or enthusiasm as unflagging, you mean that it does not stop or get less as time passes.

example.ex: He was sustained by the unflagging support of his family...
example.tran: 他得到了家人不断的支持。

means.word_mean: 1. showing sustained enthusiastic action with unflagging vitality;

auth_sentence.content: She applies herself to this purpose with unflagging energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: She applies herself to this purpose with unflagging energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She applies herself to this purpose with unflagging energy.

auth_sentence.content: Constance was furious beyond reason at his unflagging unhappiness.
auth_sentence.res_content: Constance was furious beyond reason at his unflagging unhappiness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Constance was furious beyond reason at his unflagging unhappiness.
